properties.body:
NORTH SEA.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V POLARCUS NADIA TOWING EIGHT FOUR MILE LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   56-20.2N 000-35.9E, 56-17.1N 000-28.3E,
   56-08.4N 000-39.6E, 56-22.1N 001-08.8E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1829/13(43).
